Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: fax service, children's play equipment, magazines, comics, A4 photocopier, jigsaws, local newspapers and DVDs. Provides 4 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office and Internet access available for public use. Children's activities usually arranged during the school holidays.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-6pm, Tues & Thurs closed, Wed & Fri 9.15am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times); 1st Fri in the month 10am-12noon (coffee morning)
